CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 27, 1957, pg. 3 reads: Cut as Buttons - They surely are, unless you can't appreciate the latest in Easter wearing apparel for members of the younger set. Dig my man in striped blazer and matching cap and sport shoes.  Real crazy, eh?  The group is leaving Bethany Baptist Church on Tioga St., Easter Sunday morning."
TitMainTitle: Children, including boy wearing striped cap and jacket, and two toned shoes, descending steps outside of Bethany Baptist Church on Easter Sunday, Tioga Street, another version
